abstracts.cdata!:
The project would include: (a)
            construction of civil works consisting of fishing and
            commercial berths and an approachway, a sewerage scheme, and
            various buildings; (b) purchase of a harbor master's
            launch and navigation aids maintenance equipment; (c)
            technical assistance to PAN for port administration,
            operations and reorganization of its accounting and
            financial systems; and (d) consulting services for studies
            on the need for and development of ship repair facilities.
